name: Phone
description: The Phone module provides functions for integrating with various phone systems, including retrieving player phone numbers and sending emails.

serverFunctions.name: GetPhoneName
serverFunctions.description: Gets the name of the currently active phone system.

returns.description: Name of the phone system being used

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

local phoneSystem = Bridge.Phone.GetPhoneName()
print("Using phone system: " .. phoneSystem)

serverFunctions.name: GetPlayerPhone
serverFunctions.description: Gets the phone number of a specific player.

returns.description: Player's phone number or false if not found/supported

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

local phoneNumber = Bridge.Phone.GetPlayerPhone(source)
if phoneNumber then
    print("Player's phone number: " .. phoneNumber)
else
    print("Phone number not available")
end

serverFunctions.name: SendEmail
serverFunctions.description: Sends an email to a specific player through their phone system.

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: Player server ID to send email to

returns.description: True if email was sent successfully, false otherwise

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Send a welcome email
local success = Bridge.Phone.SendEmail(
    source,
    "admin@cityserver.com",
    "Welcome to the City!",
    "Thank you for joining our server. Please read the rules and have fun!"
)

if success then
    print("Welcome email sent!")
else
    print("Failed to send email")
end
